titles.title: To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to ensure that preexisting condition exclusions with respect to enrollment in health insurance coverage and group health plans continue to be prohibited.
Continuing Coverage for Preexisting Conditions Act of 2018
Continuing Coverage for Preexisting Conditions Act of 2018
Continuing Coverage for Preexisting Conditions Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
